channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Venezuela Crisis
item.description: If President Trump intends to use military force to topple Maduro, he should go to Congress.

item.title: Trump to name Fed chair successor 'early next year'; someone willing to cut rates early and often
item.description: President Trump said Tuesday that he plans to wait until early 2026 to name his pick to lead the Federal Reserve.

item.title: Exclusive: Trump Admin To Probe Federal Subsidies Pushing Kids On Screens At School
item.description: The most recent National Assessment of Education Progress (NAEP) scores show high school math and reading scores at the lowest levels on record.

item.title: Trump boasts a 91% reduction in drug boat trafficking since military strikes began
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday said the amount of drugs coming into the U.S. by sea was down 91% since the military began striking drug boats in internati...

item.title: ‘Children Died’ And 20 Other Shocking Things An FDA Scientist Just Said About Covid Shots
item.description: 'Like many academic physicians, we felt the FDA and CDC abdicated their duty to the American people,' Prasad wrote.

item.title: Illegal Alien Superintendent’s Voter Registration Docs Deepen Need For Better Vetting
item.description: New records show Ian Roberts, the illegal alien who led public schools, appears to have claimed U.S. citizenship on Maryland voter forms.

item.title: 'You guys are crazy': Trump slams press coverage of his health
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday defended his mental fitness, saying he's been unfairly scrutinized compared with former President Joseph R. Biden.

item.title: Ilhan Omar Is Not the Kind of Immigrant America Needs
item.description: She stands for everything we shouldn’t want an immigrant to be.

item.title: Journalist group presses White House to remove 'media offenders' webpage
item.description: The Society of Professional Journalists urged the White House in a letter Monday to remove a new "media offenders" webpage that seeks to expose unethi...

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter and Franklin the Turtle publisher condemn Trump administration's use of their work
item.description: Pop singer Sabrina Carpenter and the publisher of the beloved children's character Franklin the Turtle are disavowing the Trump administration's use o...

item.title: The Problem with the Republican Party? All the Democrats
item.description: The GOP should summon the gumption to persuade converts to the Trump movement of the virtues of Republicanism.

item.title: The U.K.’s About-Face on Puberty Blockers for Children
item.description: A new major clinical trial exposing minors to puberty suppression represents an indefensible course change for the U.K.

item.title: Creedalism Needs Culture
item.description: When it comes to American identity, creedalism and culture aren’t mutually exclusive. Indeed, they must be melded.

item.title: Justice Thomas Dismantles New Jersey’s Lawfare Against Pro-Life Center With A Single Question
item.description: In a stunning admission, Iyer acknowledged that the New Jersey AG's office hasn't 'had complaints about this specific center.'

item.title: WaPo’s Latest Hegseth Hoax Is So Weak Even NYT Can See Through It
item.description: Last week The Washington Post launched yet another anti-Trump hoax, portraying Secretary of War Pete Hegseth as the perpetrator of ruthless war crimes...
